snippet.title: Saga of Sins - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description: Saga of Sins will launch 2023 on NSW, PS5, PS4, XBX and PC. Play as the righteous cleric Cecil - who can enter people’s minds by transforming into four unique demonic creatures such as a howling werewolf or a fierce gargoyle - to fight the seven deadly sins and free the plague infested village of Sinwell!
